PBTA.title: Powered by the Apocalypse
PBTA.description: Run games for any PbtA system in FoundryVTT!
PBTA.Settings.stats.name: Stats
PBTA.Settings.stats.hint: Enter a comma-separated list of stats/abilities, such as "Str,Dex,Con,Int,Wis,Cha"
PBTA.Settings.advForward.name: Clear ADV/DIS After Rolls
PBTA.Settings.advForward.hint: If enabled, advantage and disadvantage choices on the character sheet will be reset to normal after each roll (similar to Forward).
PBTA.Settings.itemIcons.name: Enable Item Icons
PBTA.Settings.itemIcons.hint: Enable visual icons for moves, spells, and equipment in character sheets (requires browser reload).
PBTA.Settings.sheetConfig.label: PbtA Sheet Configuration
PBTA.Settings.sheetConfig.name: Configure character sheets
PBTA.Settings.sheetConfig.hint: Choose the data structure for character sheets, such as stats, abilities, and details.
PBTA.Settings.sheetConfig.title: Configure character sheets
PBTA.Settings.sheetConfig.notes1: Welcome to the alpha version of the PbtA system!
PBTA.Settings.sheetConfig.notes2: We will eventually have a graphical user interface (GUI) to build character sheets, but for now you'll need to enter character sheet data in TOML format. Writing TOML is similar to working with .ini files common in modding settings for PC games.
PBTA.Settings.sheetConfig.notes3: Read through the documentation linked below before configuring your sheet. You can also head over to the #powered-by-the-apocalypse channel of the main Foundry Virtual Tabletop Discord for questions and assistance.
PBTA.Settings.sheetConfig.noteChangesDet: Changes have been detected in one or more of your actor types. Review the changes below, and then choose one of the following:
PBTA.Settings.sheetConfig.noteConfirmUpd: NOTE: Existing data in deleted attributes will be deleted permanently
PBTA.Settings.sheetConfig.noteCancel: Cancel and prevent the changes from saving
PBTA.Messages.sheetConfig.noConfig: No sheet config has been entered.
PBTA.Messages.sheetConfig.statString2: must be a string, such as "Cool"
PBTA.Messages.sheetConfig.groupAttribute: must be a group of attributes.
PBTA.Messages.sheetConfig.attributeType: must be one of the following types:
PBTA.Messages.sheetConfig.attributeTypeN: doesn't have a type (may be options that had the parent renamed).
PBTA.Messages.sheetConfig.attributeOptio: must include at least one option in the 'options' group.
PBTA.Messages.sheetConfig.moveTypes: is required and must have at least one move type.
PBTA.Messages.sheetConfig.equipmentTypes: is required and must have at least one equipment type.
PBTA.Common.Name: Name
PBTA.Dialog.ChooseConditions: Choose all conditional modifiers that apply:
PBTA.TagsHelp: (Use tab to autocomplete, commas to create new tags, and double click a tag to edit it)
PBTA.MoveGroupHelp: Multiple moves with the same move-group will be either/or selections when creating a new character using the character builder.
